00031 uint8_t HID_Protocol;
00032 uint8_t HID_IdleTime[HID_REPORT_NUM];
00033 
00034 
00035 /*
00036  *  HID Get Report Request Callback
00037  *   Called automatically on HID Get Report Request
00038  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket and EP0Buf)
00039  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00040  */
00041 
00042 uint32_t HID_GetReport (void) {
00043 
00044   /* ReportID = SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L; */
00045   switch (SetupPacket.wValue.WB.H) {
00046     case HID_REPORT_INPUT:
00047       GetInReport();
00048       EP0Buf[0] = InReport;
00049       break;
00050     case HID_REPORT_OUTPUT:
00051       return (FALSE);          /* Not Supported */
00052     case HID_REPORT_FEATURE:
00053       /* EP0Buf[] = ...; */
00054       /* break; */
00055       return (FALSE);          /* Not Supported */
00056   }
00057   return (TRUE);
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 /*
00062  *  HID Set Report Request Callback
00063  *   Called automatically on HID Set Report Request
00064  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket and EP0Buf)
00065  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00066  */
00067 
00068 uint32_t HID_SetReport (void) {
00069 
00070   /* ReportID = SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L; */
00071   switch (SetupPacket.wValue.WB.H) {
00072     case HID_REPORT_INPUT:
00073       return (FALSE);          /* Not Supported */
00074     case HID_REPORT_OUTPUT:
00075       OutReport = EP0Buf[0];
00076       SetOutReport();
00077       break;
00078     case HID_REPORT_FEATURE:
00079       return (FALSE);          /* Not Supported */
00080   }
00081   return (TRUE);
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 /*
00086  *  HID Get Idle Request Callback
00087  *   Called automatically on HID Get Idle Request
00088  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket and EP0Buf)
00089  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00090  */
00091 
00092 uint32_t HID_GetIdle (void) {
00093 
00094   EP0Buf[0] = HID_IdleTime[SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L];
00095   return (TRUE);
00096 }
00097 
00098

00101  *   Called automatically on HID Set Idle Request

00103  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00104  */
00105 
00106 uint32_t HID_SetIdle (void) {
00107 
00108   HID_IdleTime[SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L] = SetupPacket.wValue.WB.H;
00109 
00110   /* Idle Handling if needed */
00111   /* ... */
00112 
00113   return (TRUE);
00114 }
